DOC.brief_title: S0701 , Trial Three Antibiotic Regimens Eradicate Helicobacter Pylori ( H. Pylori )
DOC.detailed_description: Prevention gastric cancer eradication H. pylori one promising strategy reduce global impact cancer near term . Our long-term goal prevent gastric cancer develop validate effective , simple , low-cost approach eradication H. pylorus . Our immediate goal , therefore , conduct randomize study compare effectiveness three different drug regimen H. pylorus infection . The three study arm : Standard therapy - 14 day , 3-drug regimen Lansoprazole , amoxicillin clarithromycin ( PACx14 ) ; Concomitant therapy - 5 day , 4-drug regimen lansoprazole , amoxicillin , clarithromycin , metronidazole ( PACMx5 ) ; Sequential therapy - 10 day , 4-drug regimen lansoprazole , amoxicillin 5 day , follow lansoprazole , clarithromycin metronidazole 5 day ( PAx5/PCMx5 ) .
